^(testOnly)$.title: Whether the select is to be interpreted as a field presence test.

field.description:
For example, in the select expression `request.auth`, the `auth` portion
 of the expression would be the `field`.
field.title: Required. The name of the field to select.

operand.description:
For example, in the select expression `request.auth`, the `request`
 portion of the expression is the `operand`.
operand.title: Required. The target of the selection expression.

test_only.title: Whether the select is to be interpreted as a field presence test.
